title: FFT with out mean substraction
---


## 1. Power spectrum

```{python}
# | output: false

import jax
import nixio
import jax.numpy as jnp
import jax.scipy as jsp
import pathlib
import plotly.graph_objects as go

def pxx_theory(f, gamma, noise_strength):
    return 2 * noise_strength / (gamma**2 + (2 * jnp.pi * f) ** 2)


gamma = 1
noise_strength=0.1
theory_color = "magenta"

method = "fft_without_mean_substraction"

datafolder = pathlib.Path("../psd/data/ou/")
dataset_methods = sorted(datafolder.rglob(f"{method}*.nix"))
nix_file= nixio.File.open(str(dataset_methods[0]), "r")
block = nix_file.blocks[0]
da = block.data_arrays
pxx = da["pxx"][:]
f= da["frequency"][:]
pxx_th = pxx_theory(f, gamma, noise_strength)
fig = go.Figure()
fig.add_scattergl(x=f, y=pxx,mode="lines+markers", name="fft")
fig.add_scattergl(x=f, y=pxx_th, name="Theory", line_color=theory_color)
fig.update_yaxes(type="log")

fig.update_xaxes(range=[0, 15])
```

```{python}
# | echo: false
# | renderings: [light, dark]
fig.update_layout(
    height=600,
    width=600,
)
fig.update_layout(template="plotly_white")
display(fig)
fig.update_layout(template="plotly_dark")
display(fig)
```

## 2. Different sampling frequencies

```{python}
# | output: false
def plot_spectra_folder(fig, datafolder,name, method):
    dataset_methods = sorted(datafolder.rglob(f"{method}*.nix"))
    nix_file= nixio.File.open(str(dataset_methods[0]), "r")
    block = nix_file.blocks[0]
    da = block.data_arrays
    pxx = da["pxx"][:]
    f= da["frequency"][:]
    fig.add_scattergl(x=f, y=pxx,mode="lines+markers", name=f"{name}")

datafolder2 = pathlib.Path("../psd/data/ou/20000/")
datafolder4 = pathlib.Path("../psd/data/ou/40000/")
datafolder8 = pathlib.Path("../psd/data/ou/80000/")
datafolder16 = pathlib.Path("../psd/data/ou/160000/")

fig = go.Figure()
plot_spectra_folder(fig, datafolder2,"fft 20000 kHz",method)
plot_spectra_folder(fig, datafolder4,"fft 40000 kHz",method)
plot_spectra_folder(fig, datafolder8,"fft 80000 kHz", method)
plot_spectra_folder(fig, datafolder16,"fft 160000 kHz", method)
fig.add_scattergl(x=f, y=pxx_th, name="Theory", line_color=theory_color)
fig.update_yaxes(type="log")
fig.update_xaxes(range=[0, 15])
```
